message: I think a 55/45 split is more fair, considering I'm taking on more risk by rejecting your offer.
I can do 58/42, it's the highest I'm willing to go.
I'm willing to go up to 60/40. Let's make a deal before things get worse.
I'll meet you halfway from my last offer, but that's as high as I'll go.
We're both losing money, so let's end this. I'm willing to go up to 65/35. It's a better deal than the next round.
